item.title: Analyst: Stock Market Poised to Rise After US-EU Agreement
item.description: July 28th: Once the United States reached a trade agreement with the European Union, investors anticipated that when the market reopened on Monday, automobile manufacturers and luxury goods manufacturers would trigger a relief rally within the European stock market. On Sunday, US President Trump announced this agreement following his meeting with European Commission President Von der Leyen. According to the agreement, the majority of the EU's exports (including cars) would be subject to a 15% tariff. The EU leader indicated that this tariff was comprehensive, yet Trump stated that it did not encompass pharmaceuticals and metals.John Plassard, the Chief Investment Officer at Cit√© Gestion, asserted that this agreement was "sufficient to unlock what the stock market required the most: predictability." He remarked, "The risk of an additional escalation in tariffs has now been eliminated, followed by the vanishing of a significant macroeconomic downside. For investors, this is not merely

item.title: EU President: Trade Agreement with the United States Will Bring Stability
item.description: On July 28th, European Commission President von der Leyen said that the trade agreement reached with the United States will bring stability and agreed to impose a uniform 15% tariff.

item.title: Trump: Trade Agreement Reached with EU
item.description: On July 28th, US President Trump declared that a trade agreement had been achieved with the European Union. The EU pledged to invest an extra $600 billion in the United States compared to the previous situation.The EU has consented to permit tariff-free trade among its member countries, and all countries will make their markets accessible to the United States.The EU will acquire a substantial amount of military equipment from the United States, agree to a unified 15% tariff on automobiles, and will purchase billions of dollars' worth of military equipment.

item.title: BNB Breaks $827 for a Brief Period, Hits All-Time High
item.description: On July 28th, BNB briefly rose above $827 and reached a new all-time high. It saw a 24-hour increase of 5.20%, which pushed its market capitalization to $114.85 billion.

item.title: Trump: Tariffs on EU Will Not Be Lower Than 15%
item.description: On July 28th, President Trump of the United States said, "All trade agreements will commence from August 1st. If we were to reach an agreement with the European Union at this very moment, then it's a done deal. The tariff rate imposed on the EU will not be lower than 15%."

item.title: Trump Reiterates 50/50 Chance of Reaching Trade Deal with EU, Outcome Expected in About an Hour
item.description: On July 28th, US President Trump said, "I am supposed to meet with the EU's von der Leyen and expect that we can settle some matters. There are three to four tough issues in the EU trade negotiations. The likelihood of reaching a trade agreement with the EU is fifty-fifty. We may get the result in around an hour."

item.title: LookOnChain: Bitcoin Surges Above $119,000
item.description: On July 28th, according to HTX market data, Bitcoin experienced a rebound and surpassed $119,000, with a 24-hour percentage change of 0.88%.

item.title: PENGU Token Deployment Address Transferred $2.94 Million Worth of Tokens to CEX 1 Hour Ago
item.description: On July 27th, as per Arkham's monitoring, the deployment address of the PENGU token transferred tokens worth $2.94 million to a CEX through an intermediary address one hour ago.According to statistics on the 23rd, since July 12th, a total of 1.81 billion PENGU tokens (approximately $54.61 million) have been transferred from the PENGU token deployment address to a CEX.

item.title: ZORA experiences significant funding rate skew to the short side on various major CEXs
item.description: On July 27th, based on Coinglass data, the current open interest of the ZORA contract has reached $170 million, with a 24-hour increase of 157.22%. It is highly bearish on the funding rates within various mainstream CEXs. The platform with the largest 24-hour contract trading volume for ZORA is Binance, and the current funding rate is -1.9406%. Additionally, it is reported to be -2% on Bitget, -1.8131% on Gate, and -2% on Bybit.

item.title: A certain Fartcoin whale swapped all $2.28 million worth of Fartcoin for PUMP in a rocket swap.
item.description: On July 27th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, it was reported that 20 hours ago, a Fartcoin whale converted all of its 1.71 million Fartcoin (valued at $2.28 million) into 790.41 million PUMP.
